findings.rationale: An indefinite term may expose the Discloser to prolonged risk of information leakage, as obligations persist beyond the business relationship.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship.

findings.rationale: The broad definition may lead to difficulties in compliance and enforcement, as it encompasses all non-public information without clear boundaries.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public information, whether oral, written, or electronic, disclosed by Discloser to Recipient.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Limitation on Use of Information
findings.rationale: The agreement allows use of confidential information solely for evaluating business opportunities, which may be interpreted broadly, leading to potential misuse.
findings.evidence_quote: Use only for the purpose of evaluating business opportunities.
